Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2011 11:49AM Kmg wrote: I am also from Arkansas and have an appointment in LR in 3 weeks for evaluation. What doctor did you see? All I have is "suspicious" nipple discharge, but it is almost constant and worsens each month and has blood in it. Mammograms and two ultrasounds show nothing. I'm a little nervous about what is next. I live 3 hrs from LR and hope this guy works quickly to minimize my trips there for testing. What were your final results, if I may ask?:) Kmg
